transcript.content: I want to book a consultation with Dr. Shtern for next week

I found available consultation slots with Dr. Shtern next week on Monday, November 24th at 9:00 AM and 11:00 AM. Please let me know which time works best for you, and I'll proceed with booking your appointment.
Could you please specify which service you would like to book for Monday? This will help me check the available slots for you.
The morning slot is perfect. Book it please. I'm John Doe, 555-111-2222

I need to know what date and service you are referring to. Could you please confirm the appointment date and service type so I can proceed with booking your appointment? If you were looking to book a specific doctor, please let me know that as well.
